animal.question: I say 'meow' and like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ Some people keep me as a pet.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I say 'quack' and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat weeds and seeds.
🧡 Some are yellow and fluffy when they are babies.
💦 I like to swim in water.

animal.question: I give you milk and say 'moo'. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in a field.
🥛 You drink my milk.
⚫ I have black and white spots.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big.
💧 I can spray water with my nose.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat orange things.
🐰 I have long ears.
🌱 I like to eat vegetables from the ground

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
☀️ I live in Africa.
🐾 I'm a very big cat.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I look a bit like a horse.
🦓 I live in Africa.
🦓 I eat grass and leaves.

animal.question: I fly at night and say 'hoot'. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I have big eyes.
🌙 I sleep during the day.
🌲 I live in a tree.

animal.question: I climb trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I like to swing from branches.
🍌 I peel and eat yellow fruit.
🌴 I live in the jungle.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you need an umbrella. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm wet!
🌧️ I come from clouds.
☔ I make puddles.

weather.question: I am big and bright and hot. I shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I make you warm.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
💛 I am very yellow.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like a sheep sometimes.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
🌫️ I can block the sun.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am very cold.
⛄ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I'm around.

weather.question: I am a big storm with lots of wind and rain. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can blow your hat off.
⚡ Sometimes I have lightning.
🏡 It's best to stay inside when I visit.

weather.question: I am very strong wind. I can make the leaves fly around. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I make things move.
🪁 You can fly a kite when I'm blowing.
🌬️ You can feel me, but not see me.

weather.question: Sometimes after the rain, you can see me with many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo and violet.
☀️ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.
✨ I look like a colorful arc.

weather.question: I am small frozen raindrops, sometimes I fall during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am cold and hard
🤕 Sometimes, I hurt if I hit you
⚾ I am smaller than a baseball.

weather.question: I am a cloud that touches the ground, making it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I'm like a cloud on the ground.
🚗 You have to drive slowly when I'm around.
👻 I can make things disappear.

weather.question: Sometimes when it's very hot, I can appear as shimmering water on the road, but it's not really there. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I happen when it is really hot.
😵‍💫 You're eyes are playing tricks on you
🏜️ You might see me in a desert.
